english.segment1: tired of being clean, sick of being proper. I wanna live among the beggars. and dig out in the dirt. step outside the walls we built to protect us. don't be afraid to get some mud on your face
english.segment2: come on, come on everybody. come on, come on and serve someone
english.segment3: (chorus). let's get dirty, let's get used. no matter where you come from. if you're beaten up or bruised. let's get foolish - let's get free. free to be the one thing you were meant to be. let's get dirty
english.segment4: you might get a bruise or some blisters on your fingers. you might start a question and wonder what it's worth. you may slip and fall from the burdens that you carry. but you can't have this treasure. 'til you dig it from the dirt
english.segment5: come on, come on everybody. come on, come on and serve someone
english.segment7: come on, come on, everybody. come on, come on, serve somebody. come on, come on, everybody. come on, come on, serve somebody
